title: Adaptive Motivation and Affective Support Strategies for Adult Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Non-degree science competency enhancement program for working professionals. Mobile-optimized content delivery via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their motivation levels during science learning processes and establish improvement strategies.
Learners can apply self-regulation strategies to maintain positive emotions during scientific problem-solving processes.
Learners can design and implement science learning tasks with high personal relevance in mobile environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
